exceptions.tactic: apply gcd_mod in H2 as [H2 H3 H4 H5].
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables a, q.

In environment a, b, d : Z H : is_gcdZ a b d q, r : Z H0 : a <> OZ H1 : is_diveuclZ b a q r H2 : is_gcdZ r a d Unable to unify "is_gcdZ ?M1432 ?M1433 ?M1434" with "divide Z IdZ multZ OZ d a /\\ divide Z IdZ multZ OZ d b /\\ (forall q : Z, divide Z IdZ multZ OZ q a -> divide Z IdZ multZ OZ q b -> divide Z IdZ multZ OZ q d)".

original: intros a b d H. inversion H; subst. - apply gcd_OZ_absZ. - apply gcd_mod in H2 as [H2 H3 H4 H5]. apply gcd_mod; try auto. apply diveuclZ_sind. + intros b0 H2. apply have_gcdZ. + intros b0 a0 d0 q0 r0 H6 [IH1 IH2 IH3 IH4]. apply H0 with (d1:=d0); auto.
